name: Around the Quad in 80 Days
description:
Around the Quad in 80 Days is a cute, farm inspired 8 bit game created using the PICO-8 console.  This was our first time using the PICO-8 console and Lua programming language.

Time Frame: ~ 2 weeks

Our team:

  • Sydnee Rodriguez
  • Angela Diep
  • Ayush Surana
  • Michael Virga
  • Stephen Ray Ednave
